name: A Loan in the Dark
description:
*****PLAY IT ON FULLSCREEN***** Pitch :

You play Loan, an 8-year-old child who will have to face his greatest fear: the darkness. Stalked by it, they will have to:

  • Progress and finish the different levels composed of enemies with your different toys;
  • Dodge some enemies by hiding your eyes;
  • Come to the end of your fear by confronting it truly.
Controls :

Mouse/keyboard :

  • A : move left
  • D : move right
  • S : close eyes
  • Spacebar : jump
  • scroll wheel / 1/2/3/4/5 : select item
  • Left click : throw left
  • Rigt click : throw right
Gameplay :
  • Balloon :
  • BEHAVIOR: - when placed, flies away
  • If we jump on it, it explodes
  • Pogostick :
  • BEHAVIOR: - allow to jump higher to reach platforms or dodge an enemy
  • allow a single jump
  • Figures :
  • BEHAVIOR: - when launched, acts as a decoy to attract enemies
  • When an enemy comes into contact, figurines disappears
  • Enemy is stun for 2 seconds
  • Dinosaur :
  • BEHAVIOR: - When placed, he walks straight ahead and makes enemies disappear
  • Can be used as a platform
  • Works only on dogs
  • Legos :
  • BEHAVIOR: - When thrown, enemies walking on it are stunted for 2 seconds then slowed down for 2 seconds before regaining their initial velocity
  • Can be used as a platform
  • Works only on dogs
  • Close eyes :
  • No effect on Enemy (s) 1
  • allow to become invisible to counter Enemy(s) 2
  • Restricted use (usable 5 seconds before opening the eyes)
  • Using objects :
  • 1 single use of each object per level
  • if misuse, retry the level (several ways to complete levels)
